Package com.bibliosedaos.desktop.service

Class HorariServiceTest

java.lang.Object
com.bibliosedaos.desktop.service.HorariServiceTest
@ExtendWith(org.mockito.junit.jupiter.MockitoExtension.class) class HorariServiceTest extends Object
Proves unitaries per a HorariService. Verifica que les operacions d'horaris es delegen correctament a l'API i que les excepcions es propaguen adequadament.
